positions.title: Manager- B2B sales(Product Portfolio), Wipro

Responsible for achieving pan-India annual revenue target of USD 16 Mn by driving sales of IT
infrastructure products pertaining to datacenter and managing relationship among OEMs
∙ Managing OEMs such as Oracle, Nutanix, Lenovo, ESM tools, etc. by identifying areas of alignment
and collaboration

account managers and 100+ delivery team members across India

expertise in their technologies with Wipro's sales and pre-sales practitioners

expansion strategies, and address related business issues

recommendations: Anup Nautiyal “I have known Satish professionally for the past 3 years since he started managing Oracle Alliances in Wipro. Initially he started with managing Support Renewals and now he manages both Products & Services. He comes across as person who is focused and dedicated in whatever tasks assigned to him. During my interactions with him I could find him straight forward and sincere on all his transactions. He has an urge of doing more and increasing the business for his organization. He is and will be an asset for any organization he is associated with. I wish him all the success in all his future endeavors. ”

Sreedhar Chary “ I have known Satish as a very hardworking and dedicated colleague who enjoys to explore new ideas, think interdisciplinary, lead and inspire his team in a way which makes people work at their best. I very much enjoyed working together with Satish.”
